Ref: CXP124/2025

INSPECTOR

Ref: CXP124/2025

PETROCHEMICAL INDUSTRY
The inspection and sealing of tankers in line with procedures of QMS.
Salary: R8 000 – R10 000
Location: Bayhead, Durban

Criteria:
Matric, Relevant Tertiary Qualification is advantageous
2+ years relevant experience in the petrochemical industry, preferably previous experience in an inspection, transport or logistics industry
Knowledge of ISO 9001 quality management systems
Familiarity with OHS (health and safety) requirements
Own transport and available to work shifts/overtime as required
Honest, diligent, high level of commitment
MS Office knowledge and data capture
Good English communication skills – written and oral. Able to prepare reports

Apply via: https://forms.gle/8mRbBqpY1WY7fSPs7
